documentation.description: Date, Time and DateTime picker.  Uses flex box

attributes.name: The  name of the hidden input that stores the current date/time.
attributes.data-type: The type of picker. This attribute supersedes data-columns. options: date|time|datetime
attributes.data-columns: List of date/time units to be used.  Example: YYYY|MMM|dd
attributes.data-start-time: The initial start date/time of the input.  Defaults to now().

events.change: Fired each time the input value is changed

getters.columns: Returns an array of time units that are currently being used.
getters.startTime: Returns the starting time of the picker.
getters.value: Returns the current selected time in milliseconds
getters.name: Returns the input name

setters.startTime: Sets date-start-time to the toLocaleString() and refreshes the control.  Uses Date.parse().
setters.value: Sets the current selected value and refreshes the control. Value must be in milliseconds.
setters.name: Sets the input name and the controls name
